name: Tavern Table Tactics
description:
Tavern Table Tactics is a tactical computer board game that combines a traditional two-player board game setting with tactical RPG combat.

Take turns battling a friend in this turn-based tactical computer board game to see who can claim bragging rights as the master tactician.Features
  • 6 unique unit types at your disposal
  • Classic tactical RPG combat mechanics
  • Unique weapon and unit abilities to unleash at the opportune moment
  • Several game modes, each with their own objectives for victory (only 1 game mode available in Early Access)
  • Single-player mode with strategy component planned for future release
